/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. On either side of the street, there are buildings painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the scene. A blue truck is parked on the left side of the street, while a white car is visible on the right side. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the street.
